text: Costa Rica competed at the 1984 Winter Olympics in Sarajevo, Yugoslavia. ==Alpine skiing== ;Men {|class="wikitable" style="font-size:90%" |- !rowspan="2"|Athlete !rowspan="2"|Event !colspan="2"|Race 1 !colspan="2"|Race 2 !colspan="2"|Total |- !Time !Rank !Time !Rank !Time !Rank |- |Arturo Kinch |rowspan="2"|Giant Slalom |align="center"|1:57.84 |align="center"|79 |align="center"|1:53.27 |align="center"|62 |align="center"|3:51.11 |align="center"|67 |- |Eduardo Kopper |align="center"|1:49.35 |align="center"|70 |align="center"|1:57.23 |align="center"|66 |align="center"|3:46.58 |align="center"|65 |- |Eduardo Kopper |Slalom |align="center"|1:24.39 |align="center"|63 |align="center"|1:18.94 |align="center"|44 |align="center"|2:43.33 |align="center"|45 |} ==Biathlon== ;Men {|class="wikitable" style="font-size:90%" |- !Event !Athlete !Misses 1 !Time !Rank |- |10 km Sprint |Hernán Carazo |align="center"|DNF |align="center"|DNF |align="center"|- |} {|class="wikitable" style="font- size:90%" |- !Event !Athlete !Time !Penalties !Adjusted time 2 !Rank |- |20 km |Hernán Carazo |align="center"|2'13:54.9 |align="center"|11 |align="center"|2'24:54.9 |align="center"|61 |} : 1 A penalty loop of 150 metres had to be skied per missed target. : 2 One minute added per missed target. ==Cross-country skiing== ;Men {|class="wikitable" border="1" style="font-size:90%" |- !rowspan=2|Event !rowspan=2|Athlete !colspan=2|Race |- !Time !Rank |- |15 km |Arturo Kinch |align=center|58:42.9 |align=center|79 |- |30 km |Arturo Kinch |align=center|DSQ |align=center|- |} ==References== *Official Olympic Reports * Olympic Winter Games 1984, full results by sports- reference.com Category:Nations at the 1984 Winter Olympics 1984 Winter Olympics Category:1984 in Costa Rican sport
